text: يخافون ربهم من فوقهم ويفعلون ما يؤمرون

translations.translation: They fear their Lord above them and do everything they are ordered to do.
They have fear of God for His power over them, and act as commanded.
They hold their Lord, Who is above them, in fear, and do as they are bidden.
They (angels) have fear of their Lord above them and fulfill His commands.
They bear upon themselves the fear of their Lord, and do only what they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them and do what they are commanded.
they fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and do what they are bidden.
they fear their Lord above them, and do what they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them and do that which they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and do what they are commanded.
They all revere their Lord, high above them, and they do all that they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
they fear their Lord from above them and do as they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.

[16:50] They, that is, the angels, fear (yakhāfūna is a circumstantial qualifier referring to the person governing [the verb] yastakbirūna, ‘they are [not] arrogant’) their Lord from above them (min fawqihim is a circumstantial qualifier referring to [the suffixed pronoun] -hum [of fawqihim]) in other words, [they fear their Lord], being High above them with the power to subjugate, and they do what they are commanded, to [do].
(They fear their Lord above them) Who is above them on the throne, (and do) i.e. they say (what they are bidden) meaning the angels.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text:
{ ولله يَسْجُد } ينقاد { ما في السموات } في عالم الأرواح من أهل الجبروت والملكوت والأرواح المجرّدة المقدّسة { وما في الأرض } في عالم الأجساد من الدواب والأناسيّ والأشجار وجميع النفوس والقوى الأرضية والسماوية { وهم لا يَسْتَكْبِرون } لا يمتنعون عن الانقياد والتذلّل لأمره { يخافون ربّهم } أي: ينكسرون ويتأثرون وينفعلون منه انفعال الخائف { من فوقهم } من قهره وتأثيره وعلوّه عليهم { ويفعلون ما يؤمرون } طوعاً وانقياداً بحيث لا يسعهم فعل غيره
 { إذا فريق منكم بربهم يُشْرِكون } بنسبة النعمة إلى غيره ورؤيته منه، وكذا بنسبة الضرّ إلى الغير وإحالة الذنب في ذلك عليه، والاستعانة في رفعه به
 قال الله تعالى:

 " أنا والجنّ والإنس في نبأ عظيم، أخْلُقْ ويُعْبَد غيري، وأرْزُق ويُشْكر غيري "

translations.translation:
{And to Allah they prostrate}, { whatever is in the heavens } in the world of spirits from the people of Jabrut and Malakut and the purely sacred spirits { and whatever is on the earth } in the world of bodies from the animals and the people and the trees and all the souls and the terrestrial and celestial powers { and they are not arrogant } they do not refuse to prostrate and surrender to His command { they fear their Lord } that is, they are broken and affected and they do something of the fear reaction { above them } from His power and effect and His highness over them { and they do what they are commanded } willingly and submissively so that no one can do otherwise.


"If a group of you is attributing partners to Allah in terms of His blessings and His vision,",

And likewise with respect to harm done to others and the attribution of blame in that regard., And seek help in raising it {i.e. the child} by Him.
 Allah said:


"{وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَّكُ} عَنِ الْمُنكَرِ وَ{الْعَمَلِ السَّيِّئِ} إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَأُولَٰئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ حَسَنَاتٍ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا"

"{And how should they repent} from {disbelief} and {evil deeds} except by those who repent and believe and do good deeds? Allah will change the evil deeds of those who repent and believe and do good deeds into good deeds. Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful."


I, the jinn, and mankind are in a great story.,

I was created, and I am worshipped, but I am not God.,

"And {grant} me {provision} and {make} me {thankful} to {others}"

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وإنما يسجد أولئك الساجدون المتذللون؛ لأنهم { يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُمْ } القادر على الإنعام والانتقام أن يرسل عليهم عذاباً { مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ } لأنهم مقهورون تحت قبضة قدرته { وَ } لذلك { يَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ } [النحل: 50] ويجتنبون عما ينهون
